title: What is the speed of 75Km long train which passes a 150m long platform in 10 seconds? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am going to assume you made an error when you said the train’s length is 75 km. I assume 75 m. The train’s front car has to go 225 m to get the last car off the platform. So 225 m in 10 s … speed = distance/time …

Distance of 225 metres (150 metres platform & 75 metre length of train)Time 10 seconds225 metres divided by 10 seconds = Travel Rate of 22.5 metres per second.Answer: Speed 81 km/h ( 22.5 metres per second x 3,600 seconds Hour)
